title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python SDK for Ollama—install via pip and chat with local models in a few lines.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Deno, Bun and browsers.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package letting you swap in Ollama models for chains, agents and RAG.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama (like ChatGPT UI) with multi-model support, code highlighting, RAG uploads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client for Ollama with Kotlin & Spring Boot examples; Maven Central artifact.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper for Ollama with chat history, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and explanations.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU node selection and PVC.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Streamlit UI.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration node to use Ollama models for generative QA and summarization pipelines.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node that adds an Ollama chat action to no-code workflows.

title: ollama-dbee
summary: DBBee SQL IDE plugin to run Ollama models for natural-language-to-SQL and query explanations.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that answers users via an Ollama backend with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-fastapi
summary: FastAPI service exposing extra endpoints (batch chat, embeddings, health) on top of Ollama.

title: ollama-mcp
summary: Model Context Protocol server so Ollama models can be consumed by MCP-compatible clients.

title: ollama-keras
summary: Keras-NLP experimental connector to run Ollama models for fine-tune and inference inside TF workflows.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir library wrapping Ollama HTTP API with GenServer and telemetry for BEAM apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing async/await bindings to Ollama with tokio and serde.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with IAsyncEnumerable streaming and integration into Semantic Kernel.
